attributes.action: To go into lock down how Italy have.
attributes.additional_details: To protect the elderly and the vunerable as everyone is very worried and upset
attributes.background: I want the government to take measures seriously and actually do something about the coronavirus regardless of how long it takes. I say we take things seriously how Italy have

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301397

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
